ProjectTitle: Zeoliet katalysatoren voor CO2 reductie naar dimethylether
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/03/2023
Data: if you find potential for valorization please contact LRD to discuss how this may affect publishing and data sharing https://lrd.kuleuven.be/
Preservation: Please note that Box is not very suitable for long term storage of research data, have a look at the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Can you use a repository for data sharing? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing

17/03/2023
You now submitted the RDM questions from your application, at this stage of your fellowship FWO expects a full DMP using the Flemish standard DMP template. You can find the template in DMPonline.be or, if you prefer a word template, here: www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/
label: good with suggestions
